history.proof: intros m z t H. unfold expf in *. destruct H as [H1 H2]. split. - apply H1. - destruct H2 as [i Hi]. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), expf m z t -> expf m t z

Premises:
expf = fun (m : fmap) (x y : dart) => inv_hmap m /\ MF.expo m x y : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
dart = nat : Set
expfo_expf : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> expfo m x z t < -> expf m z t
MA0.expo1_ex_j : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MA0.Iter_upb m z in MA0.ex_j m z t (p - 1) < -> MA0.expo1 m z t
expfo = fun (m : fmap) (x z t : dart) => expf (L (B m zero x) zero x (A m zero x)) z t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> dart -> Prop
MA0.ex_j_dec : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (n : nat), {MA0.ex_j m z t n} + {~ MA0.ex_j m z t n}
MF.expo_dec : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> {MF.expo m z t} + {~ MF.expo m z t}
MA0.expo1_dec : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> {MA0.expo1 m z t} + {~ MA0.expo1 m z t}
expf_refl : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> expf m z z
MF.PL3 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := MF.Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (MF.f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
MA0.ex_j = fix ex_j (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (n : nat) {struct n} : Prop := match n with | 0%nat => z = t | S n0 => Iter (MA0.f m) n z = t \/ ex_j m z t n0 end : fmap -> dart -> dart -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ _ _ nat_scope]
OMEGA7 : forall x y z t : Z, z > 0 -> t > 0 -> 0 <= x -> 0 <= y -> 0 <= x * z + y * t
MF.expo = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (exists i : nat, Iter (MF.f m) i z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
MA0.expo = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (exists i : nat, Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
MA1.expo = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (exists i : nat, Iter (MA1.f m) i z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
MA0.expo1 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (let p := MA0.Iter_upb m z in exists j : nat, (j < p)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) j z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
expf_dec : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), {expf m x y} + {~ expf m x y}
expf_planar_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m one x y -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar (L m one x y)
expf_planar_rcp_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar (L m one x y) -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar m
expf_planar_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m zero x y -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar (L m zero x y)
expf_planar_rcp_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar (L m zero x y) -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar m
weak_planarity_criterion_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar m < -> planar (L m one x y)
weak_planarity_criterion_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar m < -> planar (L m zero x y)
planarity_criterion_RCP_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> planar (L m one x y) -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y)
planarity_criterion_RCP_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar m -> planar (L m zero x y) -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y
planarity_criterion_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar m -> planar (L m zero x y) < -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y
planarity_criterion_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> planar (L m one x y) < -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y)
MF.exd_diff_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MF.diff_orb m z
MF.expo_refl : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), exd m z -> MF.expo m z z
planarity_crit_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar (L m one x y) < -> planar m /\ (~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y))
planarity_crit_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar (L m zero x y) < -> planar m /\ (~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y)
exd_not_nil : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> z <> nil
succ_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m z
MA0.f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> McA0.f_1 m (McA0.f m z) = z
not_exd_F_1_nil : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> F_1 m z = nil
nopred_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k z = z
nosucc_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k z = z
cA_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA_1 m k z <> nil -> exd m z
not_exd_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> top m k z = nil
not_exd_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> bottom m k z = nil
not_exd_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> cA_1 m k z = nil
not_exd_A_nil : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> A m k z = nil

```intros m z t H.
unfold expf in *.
destruct H as [H1 H2].
split.
- exact H1.
- destruct H2 as [i Hi].
  exists i.
  symmetry.
  assumption.
```

original: intros m z t H. unfold expf in *. destruct H as [H1 H2]. split. - apply H1. - destruct H2 as [i Hi]. exists i. symmetry. auto.
